languages.text: Некоторые виды оружия позволяют совершать атаки очередью. Совершая такую атаку в ближнем бою, персонаж наносит несколько ударов в одну цель. Если первый удар попадает в цель, то и последующие тоже. Если цель уклоняется от первого удара или парирует его, с последующими ударами происходит то же самое. Во время стрельбы очередью происходит несколько последовательных выстрелов, которые могут не совпадать по траектории. Большая часть выстрелов проходит по центру области атаки — чем больше врагов окажется на центральной линии, тем больше из них получат урон в случае успешного попадания. Второй и последующие выстрелы менее точны, чем первый, так как вероятность их отклонения от центральной линии увеличена. Атаки очередью особенно эффективны против скопления врагов. Будьте осторожны! Такие выстрелы могут попасть по союзникам, если те окажутся в зоне поражения.

Certain types of weapons let you make {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks. When performing a melee burst attack, the character makes several strikes against a single target. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried. When performing a ranged burst attack, the character fires several successive shots with different trajectories. Most of these shots are concentrated in the centre of the selected attack cone; therefore, the more enemies there are in the centre of this area, the more of them will be damaged if the attack is successful. All shots fired after the first one are less accurate and have a higher chance of deviating from the central line. Burst shots are particularly effective against clusters of enemies. Be careful: burst shots can hit allies if they are standing in the direction of the attack.

traits.locale_text: Certain weapon types let you make burst attacks. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, burst fire requires you to select a direction rather than a specific target. Burst attacks are particularly effective against clusters of enemies. When performing a burst attack, the character fires several successive shots in different directions. Most of these shots are concentrated in the centre of the attack area you have selected, therefore the more enemies are in the centre of this area, the more of them will be damaged if the attack is successful. All shots fired after the first one are less accurate and have a higher chance of deviating from the central trajectory. Be careful: burst fire shots can hit allies if they are standing in the direction of the attack.

Certain weapon types let you make burst attacks. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, burst fire requires you to select a direction rather than a specific target. Burst attacks are particularly effective against clusters of enemies. When performing a burst attack, the character fires several successive shots in different directions. Most of these shots are concentrated in the centre of the attack area you have selected, therefore the more enemies are in the centre of this area, the more of them will be damaged if the attack is successful. All shots fired after the first one are less accurate and have a higher chance of deviating from the central trajectory. Be careful: burst fire shots can hit allies if they are standing in the direction of the attack.

Certain types of weapons let you make {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, burst fire requires you to select a direction rather than a specific target. Burst attacks are particularly effective against clusters of enemies. When performing a burst attack, the character {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}fires{/g} several successive shots in different directions. Most of these shots are concentrated in the centre of the selected attack cone, therefore the more enemies there are in the centre of this area, the more of them will be damaged if the attack is successful. All shots fired after the first one are less accurate and have a higher chance of deviating from the central trajectory. languages.text: Algunos tipos de arma te permiten realizar ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfaga{/g}. Al realizar un ataque de ráfaga cuerpo a cuerpo, el personaje dirige varios golpes contra un solo objetivo. Si el primer golpe impacta, los siguientes impactan automáticamente. Si el primer golpe se esquiva o se para, los siguientes se esquivan o paran automáticamente. Al realizar un ataque de ráfaga a distancia, el personaje dirige varios disparos consecutivos con distintas trayectorias. La mayoría de los disparos se dirigen hacia el centro del cono de ataque elegido, por lo que, cuantos más enemigos haya en el centro, más de ellos recibirán daño del ataque. Todos los disparos después del primero son menos precisos y tienen una mayor probabilidad de desviarse de la línea central. Las ráfagas a distancia son especialmente eficaces contra aglomeraciones de enemigos. Ten cuidado: las ráfagas pueden alcanzar a tus aliados si están en la dirección del ataque.
languages.original_text: Certain types of weapons let you make {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks. When performing a melee burst attack, the character makes several strikes against a single target. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. languages.text: 特定の種類の武器は{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}連射{/g}攻撃ができる。 近接連続攻撃を行う際、キャラクターは1体のターゲットに対して複数回攻撃する。最初の攻撃がターゲットに当たった場合、それ以降の攻撃はすべて自動的に命中する。最初の攻撃が回避または受け流された場合、それ以降の攻撃はすべて自動的に回避または受け流される。 遠距離連射攻撃を行う際、キャラクターはさまざまな軌道へ複数の連続射撃を発射する。この射撃の大半は選択した扇形攻撃範囲の中央に集まる。そのため、敵がこのエリアの中心部にいればいるだけ、攻撃が成功した際にダメージを受ける数は増える。最初の1発以降の射撃は精密度が下がり、中央ラインから逸脱する確立は高くなる。連続射撃は特に固まっている敵に対して効果的だ。 注：連続射撃は、攻撃方向に立っている味方を攻撃する可能性がある。
languages.original_text: Certain types of weapons let you make {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks. When performing a melee burst attack, the character makes several strikes against a single target. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried. When performing a ranged burst attack, the character fires several successive shots with different trajectories. Most of these shots are concentrated in the centre of the selected attack cone; therefore, the more enemies there are in the centre of this area, the more of them will be damaged if the attack is successful. All shots fired after the first one are less accurate and have a higher chance of deviating from the central line. Burst shots are particularly effective against clusters of enemies. Be careful: burst shots can hit allies if they are standing in the direction of the attack.

traits.locale_text: 特定の種類の武器は{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}連射{/g}攻撃ができる。 近接連続攻撃を行う際、キャラクターは1体のターゲットに対して複数回攻撃する。最初の攻撃がターゲットに当たった場合、それ以降の攻撃はすべて自動的に命中する。最初の攻撃が回避または受け流された場合、それ以降の攻撃はすべて自動的に回避または受け流される。 遠距離連射攻撃を行う際、キャラクターはさまざまな軌道へ複数の連続射撃を発射する。この射撃の大半は選択した扇形攻撃範囲の中央に集まる。そのため、敵がこのエリアの中心部にいればいるだけ、攻撃が成功した際にダメージを受ける数は増える。最初の1発以降の射撃は精密度が下がり、中央ラインから逸脱する確立は高くなる。連続射撃は特に固まっている敵に対して効果的だ。 注：連続射撃は、攻撃方向に立っている味方を攻撃する可能性がある。

languages.text: 某些特定类型的武器可以进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}攻击。 当进行连续近战攻击时，角色会对单个目标进行多次攻击。如果第一次攻击命中了目标，则后续所有攻击都会命中目标。如果第一次攻击被目标闪避或招架，则后续所有攻击都会被闪避或招架。 当进行连发射击时，角色会连续进行多次射击，每颗子弹的射击弹道各不相同。绝大部分射击都会集中在攻击扇形区域中心。因此，如果攻击命中敌人的话，扇形中心区域敌人越多，受到伤害的敌人就会越多。首次射击之后，接下来的所有射击精确度都会下降，子弹会更容易偏离弹道中线。连发射击对付集群敌人时非常有效。 要当心，如果盟友也在攻击区域内，连发射击同样可能会命中盟友。
languages.original_text: Certain types of weapons let you make {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks. When performing a melee burst attack, the character makes several strikes against a single target. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried. When performing a ranged burst attack, the character fires several successive shots with different trajectories. Most of these shots are concentrated in the centre of the selected attack cone; therefore, the more enemies there are in the centre of this area, the more of them will be damaged if the attack is successful. All shots fired after the first one are less accurate and have a higher chance of deviating from the central line. Burst shots are particularly effective against clusters of enemies. Be careful: burst shots can hit allies if they are standing in the direction of the attack.

languages.text: Einige Waffen ermöglichen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Salvenangriffe{/g}. Ein Nahkampf-Salvenangriff besteht aus mehreren Attacken auf ein Einzelziel. Trifft der erste Hieb das Ziel, treffen alle folgenden Hiebe automatisch. Wenn das Ziel dem ersten Hieb ausweicht oder diesen pariert, gilt dies automatisch auch für alle folgenden Hiebe. Im Falle eines Fernkampf-Salvenangriffs feuert der Charakter mehrere Schüsse mit unterschiedlichen Flugbahnen ab. Die meisten dieser Schüsse konzentrieren sich auf das Zentrum des gewählten Angriffskegels. Je mehr Gegner sich also in der Mitte dieses Bereichs aufhalten, desto mehr von ihnen erleiden durch einen erfolgreichen Angriff Schaden. Alle Schüsse nach dem ersten Schuss sind unpräziser und haben eine höhere Chance, von der zentralen Linie abzuweichen. Salven sind gegen größere Ansammlungen von Gegnern besonders effektiv. Aber Vorsicht! Salven können auch Verbündete verletzen, wenn diese im Schussfeld stehen.
languages.original_text: Certain types of weapons let you make {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks. When performing a melee burst attack, the character makes several strikes against a single target. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. When performing a ranged burst attack, the character fires several successive shots with different trajectories. All shots fired after the first one are less accurate and have a higher chance of deviating from the central line. Burst shots are particularly effective against clusters of enemies. Be careful: burst shots can hit allies if they are standing in the direction of the attack.

Trifft der erste Hieb das Ziel, treffen alle folgenden Hiebe automatisch. Wenn das Ziel dem ersten Hieb ausweicht oder diesen pariert, gilt dies automatisch auch für alle folgenden Hiebe. Im Falle eines Fernkampf-Salvenangriffs feuert der Charakter mehrere Schüsse mit unterschiedlichen Flugbahnen ab. Aber Vorsicht! Salven können auch Verbündete verletzen, wenn diese im Schussfeld stehen.

languages.text: Certains types d'armes permettent de porter des attaques en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}rafale{/g}. Lors d'une attaque de mêlée en rafale, le personnage assène plusieurs coups à une même cible. Si le premier coup touche la cible, tous les coups suivants la touchent automatiquement. À l'inverse, si le premier coup est esquivé ou paré, il en est de même pour tous les coups suivants. Lors d'une attaque en rafale à distance, le personnage tire plusieurs coups successifs suivant des trajectoires différentes. La plupart de ces tirs se concentrent au centre du cône d'attaque sélectionné. Dès lors, plus il y a d'ennemis au centre de cette zone, plus ils subiront de dégâts si l'attaque aboutit. Les tirs suivant le premier tir sont moins précis et ont plus de chances de dévier de la trajectoire centrale. Les tirs en rafale sont particulièrement efficaces contre les groupes d'ennemis. Attention : les tirs en rafale peuvent toucher les alliés situés dans la direction de l'attaque.
languages.original_text: Certain types of weapons let you make {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g} attacks. When performing a melee burst attack, the character makes several strikes against a single target. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried. When performing a ranged burst attack, the character fires several successive shots with different trajectories. Most of these shots are concentrated in the centre of the selected attack cone; therefore, the more enemies there are in the centre of this area, the more of them will be damaged if the attack is successful. All shots fired after the first one are less accurate and have a higher chance of deviating from the central line. Burst shots are particularly effective against clusters of enemies. Be careful: burst shots can hit allies if they are standing in the direction of the attack.

Lors d'une attaque de mêlée en rafale, le personnage assène plusieurs coups à une même cible. Si le premier coup touche la cible, tous les coups suivants la touchent automatiquement. À l'inverse, si le premier coup est esquivé ou paré, il en est de même pour tous les coups suivants. Lors d'une attaque en rafale à distance, le personnage tire plusieurs coups successifs suivant des trajectoires différentes. La plupart de ces tirs se concentrent au centre du cône d'attaque sélectionné. Dès lors, plus il y a d'ennemis au centre de cette zone, plus ils subiront de dégâts si l'attaque aboutit. Les tirs suivant le premier tir sont moins précis et ont plus de chances de dévier de la trajectoire centrale. Les tirs en rafale sont particulièrement efficaces contre les groupes d'ennemis. Attention : les tirs en rafale peuvent toucher les alliés situés dans la direction de l'attaque.

Certains types d'armes vous permettent d'effectuer des attaques {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}en rafale{/g}. Contrairement aux {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}tirs au coup par coup{/g}, les tirs en rafale vous obligent à choisir une direction plutôt qu'une cible spécifique. Les attaques en rafale sont particulièrement efficaces contre les groupes d'ennemis. Lors d'une attaque en rafale, le personnage {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}tire{/g} plusieurs coups successifs dans différentes directions. La plupart de ces tirs se concentrent au centre du cône d'attaque sélectionné. Dès lors, plus il y a d'ennemis au centre de cette zone, plus ils subiront de dégâts si l'attaque aboutit. Les tirs suivants le premier tir sont moins précis et ont plus de chances de dévier de la trajectoire centrale. Attention : Les tirs en rafale peuvent toucher les alliés situés dans la direction de l'attaque.

languages.text: Belirli bazı silah türleri {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}seri saldırı{/g} yapabilmeni sağlar. Karakter, seri yakın dövüş saldırısı yaparken tek bir hedefe birkaç atak gerçekleştirir. İlk atak, hedefe vurursa ardından gelen tüm ataklar da otomatik olarak vurur. İlk atağa karşı kaçınma veya savuşturma yapılırsa, ardından gelen tüm ataklara karşı da kaçınma veya savuşturma gerçekleşir. Karakter, seri menzilli saldırı yaparken farklı mermi yollarına art arda birkaç atış gerçekleştirir. Bu atışların çoğu, seçilen saldırı konisinin merkezine odaklanır. Bu nedenle bu alanın merkezinde ne kadar çok düşman varsa saldırının başarılı olması hâlinde o kadar fazlası hasar alır. İlkinin ardından yapılan tüm atışlar daha az isabetlidir ve merkezî hattan sapma olasılıkları da daha yüksektir. Seri atışlar, düşman kümelerine karşı bilhassa etkilidir. Dikkatli ol: Dost birimler seri atışların yönünde duruyorlarsa kurşunların hedefi olabilirler.
